tasks.sql_string:
begin transaction;
truncate table internal.coa_climate_justice_by_address;
insert into internal.coa_climate_justice_by_address
SELECT 
m.objectid,
m.address_full::character varying(50) AS address,
m.civicaddress_id,
m.property_pinnum,
m.shape address_point,
cj.geoid geo_id,
cj.resland AS landslide,
cj.resflood AS flood,
cj.wfirescore AS wildfire,
cj.resiliency AS resiliencyscore,
cj.cj_score,
cj.sum_scores,
cj.shape as block_group
FROM internal.coa_bc_address_master m,
internal.coa_climate_justice_index cj
WHERE st_within(m.shape, cj.shape);
commit;
